page.title: 15Housing
page.content:
There are a number of different sorts of housing in Wybunbury. There are a number of old cottage-type dwellings which at one time must have formed the nucleus of the village. To these have been added a wide range of more modern housing.There are a number of council houses most of which have been bought from the council by their occupants.
There are large private housing estates springing up which offer modern housing at a reasonable price, thus attracting first time buyers.
A number of vacaant, isolated farm houses and similar large houses have been privately bought and renovated.An example of this is the old Wybunbury Vicarage which is now a luxury home.
